Articles.Content: Greetings, why the weather numbers change color from green to yellow and very rare to red. technically what explain? is it bad that it turns yellow? Although I do not get slow as I see. but it is yellow. Thank you

I’m not sure what you mean by weather numbers. Do you mean the time/date numbers in the upper left? Green means the game is keeping up with the frame rate. Yellow means the physics calculations are starting to lag behind, so the frame rate (frames per second) slows down a little, but you may not notice. Red is when there are so many calculations going on (high part count crafts) that the frame rate gets choppy, and may better expressed as “seconds per frame”
